author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Misc. test suite tidying.  Also, lay the initial groundwork
for reasonably efficient usage of SVNTests by SVNAdminTests.
(removeRepository): Use the version of removeDirOrFile() from
(setUp, tearDown): Update for rename of removeDirectoryWithContent()
improve implementation to handle files or directories using code
(OneTest.OneTest): Improve JavaDoc.  Add overload which accepts a
"createWC" flag which indicates whether or not to create the WC on
disk and corresponding expected WC model.  Narrow scope of
exceptions which are declared to be thrown to those that actually
are declared to be thrown to those that actually are.  Update for
(OneTest.checkStatus): Narrow scope of exceptions which are declared
to be thrown to those that actually are.

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Improve order of test suite execution by running lower-level

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Decouple the test suite/runner and the test classes
themselves, removing a circular dependency.  Start actually running
(check-javahl): Invoke the RunTests class instead of SVNTests.
Bump copyright year and remove unnecessary import statements.
(suite, main): Remove.  Now present in RunTests.
A new class defining our test suite/runner, factored out of SVNTests
Bump copyright year and remove unnecessary import statements.
Reduce class visibility from public to package-private.

author: dlr
msg: (base_dir_entries): Avoid unnecessary use of a sub-pool.
